intro: Dive in for a cheeky ocean to space rescue
description:
Coralia the mermaid and a brilliantly crafty crab set off on a magical adventure to help Explorer 1, a stranded robot, make it back home among the stars.
On board a delightfully odd, cobbled together ship, they will have to face sea dangers and cosmic challenges on a journey that aims to connect the ocean depths with the mysteries of the universe.

An interactive storybook experience. A linear narrative adventure that is perfect for young readers to enjoy a captivating story at their own pace.
